It just seems less than ideal that a default depth is 2, and with no warning if some info is missed.

# Steps to reproduce

```powershell
$in = @'
{
    "Users":  [
                  {
                      "isCertified":  true,
                      "Email":  [
                                    "onemail",
                                    "twomail",
                                    "threemail"
                                ]
                  }
              ]
}
'@

$in | convertfrom-json | convertto-json
```

# Expected behavior

```none
{
    "Users":  [
                  {
                      "isCertified":  true,
                      "Email":  [
                                    "onemail",
                                    "twomail",
                                    "threemail"
                                ]
                  }
              ]
}
```

# Actual behavior

```none
{
    "Users":  [
                  {
                      "isCertified":  true,
                      "Email":  "onemail twomail threemail"
                  }
              ]
}
```
